root: ^Finally, the crypt. The most powerful artifacts of the Dungeon slumber in these underground corridors.
^Hmm... An archer dares to disturb my sleep in this time ?
^The Dragon! Impossible to approach the treasure stealthily!
^Certainly not! Before reaching the riches of my lair, you will have to face its guardians.
^Hmm... All of this doesn't bode well for me...
^Wait until you see what's in the mist, you won't be disappointed.
^Ha! Are you saying there are treasures in the mist?
^Boss, I brought you your coffee but...
^...after passing through the mist a skeleton tried to kill me!
^And your mug fell on the ground...
^HA! There's not $really$ any treasure in the mist after all!
